BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_DISCIPLINE_ACTION_DTL (STR_EMP_NUMBER, GNUM_SLNO_MAIN, STR_CHARGS_ORD_NO, DT_CHARGS_ORD_DATE, STR_CHARGS_ORD_ISSUE, STR_REMARKS_CHARG, STR_EVENT_DETAILS, STR_DECISION, NUM_PENALTY_ID, STR_PEN_DESCRIPTION, NUM_PENALTY_AMOUNT, STR_DEDUCT_FRM_SALERY, NUM_PENALTY_YEAR, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_EMP_DISCIPLINE_ACTION_DTL A SET A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=?, A.GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=?, A.STR_CHARGS_ORD_NO=?, A.DT_CHARGS_ORD_DATE=?, A.STR_CHARGS_ORD_ISSUE=?, A.STR_REMARKS_CHARG=?, A.STR_EVENT_DETAILS=?, A.STR_DECISION=?, A.NUM_PENALTY_ID=?, A.STR_PEN_DESCRIPTION=?, A.NUM_PENALTY_AMOUNT=?, A.STR_DEDUCT_FRM_SALERY=?, A.NUM_PENALTY_YEAR=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER =? AND A.GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_DISCIPLINE_ACTION_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER =? AND A.GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
